title: Trade finance startup Vayana Network raises Rs 114 cr to increase trade credit to micro, small businesses - The Financial Express
content: Trade finance startup Vayana Network raises Rs 114 cr to increase trade credit to micro, small businesses  The Financial Express
description: Credit and Finance for MSMEs: The company will also launch Vayana ITFS (International Trade Finance Services) platform at GIFT City, Gujarat in the current financial year.
